title: Episode 20: Remembering Anarcha
description: J. Marion Sims is remembered as the father of modern gynecology. Forgotten are the mothers—the enslaved women whose bodies were sacrificed for the advancement of his research.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
